metadata.title: CVE-2022-34841 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper buffer restrictions in the Intel(R) Media SDK software beforeversion 22.2.2 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableescalation of privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34841` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmfx-tools - 22.5.4-1ubuntu1
libmfx1 - 22.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '22.5.4-1ubuntu1').
